spatial_accuracy.notes: Major spatial failures include the Garage significantly shortened, the Alfresco area enclosed by phantom walls, and Bedrooms 3 & 4 lacking correct window alignments. The central corridor proportions are slightly stretched compared to the 2D plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Severe errors in wall continuity. Several internal doors are missing (E1) or rendered as solid walls. The Verandah and Portico at the entrance are simplified into a single generic slab without the specified columns.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture scale is inconsistent; the car in the garage is undersized. Dining tables and sofa sets are present but do not match the specific counts/orientations shown in the architectural plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: While the lighting is soft and pleasant, the geometry contains artifacts. The isometric camera is slightly off-axis, leading to perspectival distortion rather than a true orthographic projection.

detected_errors.description: Missing entry door and internal passage doors between living and bed zones.
Alfresco dining set is misplaced relative to the living room egress.
Garage depth is severely reduced, truncating the footprint.
Hallucinated exterior wall enclosing the Alfresco area which should be open-air.
Wall thickness flickering and non-manifold geometry in the Laundry/WC cluster.
